author: Daniel Nasaw
title: Key Points in New Homeland Security Deportation Memos - Washington Wire - WSJ
text:
The Department of Homeland Security on Tuesday issued a pair of memos spelling out strict new policies for the detention and deportation of illegal immigrants. Here are some of the key points: Who is subject to deportation? Under former President ’s administration, undocumented immigrants who weren’t convicted of serious crimes or who had come to […]
